headline: Is It Time To Reconsider PayPal (PYPL) After A 75% Five Year Share Price Fall?
summary: This article examines whether PayPal Holdings' current share price still aligns with its long term potential, or if the market has moved on, by walking through what the numbers indicate about value today. After a long period of weaker returns, including a 37.7% loss over the past year and a 75.6% loss over five years, some investors are reassessing whether the recent share price near US$55.89 reflects too much pessimism or ongoing risks. Recent attention on the stock has largely focused on...
